subject: [Mhln] OEM Controversy Update.
body:
If you would have me weep, you must first of all feel grief yourself.


We begin to die as soon as we are born, and the end is linked to the beginning.

Educate people without religion and you make them but clever devils.

Men often bear little grievances with less courage than they do large misfortunes.

Be he a king or a peasant, he is happiest who finds peace at home.

He who forgiveth, and is reconciled unto his enemy, shall receive his reward from God for he loveth not the unjust doers.

Nothing is less instructive than a machine.

Bullets cannot be recalled. They cannot be uninvented. But they can be taken out of the gun.

When great changes occur in history, when great principles are involved, as a rule the majority are wrong.

Men at sometime are the masters of their fate.

Against you I will fling myself, unvanquished and unyielding, O Death!

Our friends don't see our faults, or conceal them, or soften them.

Faith... is the art of holding on to things your reason once accepted, despite your changing moods.
